publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7682♦ Michael Matheson: Denny Town Centre Regeneration—That the Parliament considers that there is widespread dissatisfaction among residents in the Denny and Dunipace area regarding the planned Denny town centre regeneration; believes that Denny town centre is in desperate need of regeneration, and would welcome regeneration plans that carry widespread support in the local community.
S3M-7682♦ Denny Town Centre Regeneration (lodged on 11 January 2011) Rob Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-7682♦ Denny Town Centre Regeneration (lodged on 11 January 2011) John Wilson*, Sandra White*

S3M-7682♦ Michael Matheson: Denny Town Centre Regeneration—That the Parliament considers that there is widespread dissatisfaction among residents in the Denny and Dunipace area regarding the planned Denny town centre regeneration; believes that Denny town centre is in desperate need of regeneration, and would welcome regeneration plans that carry widespread support in the local community. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Jamie Hepburn, Gil Paterson, Bill Kidd, John Wilson, Sandra White
S3M-7682♦ Denny Town Centre Regeneration (lodged on 11 January 2011) Stewart Stevenson*
S3M-7682 Denny Town Centre Regeneration (lodged on 11 January 2011) Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-7682# Denny Town Centre Regeneration (lodged on 11 January 2011) Christina McKelvie*
S3M-7682# Denny Town Centre Regeneration (lodged on 11 January 2011) Stuart McMillan*
